Title: My Tiny Senpai
Actors: Ricco Fajardo, Megan Shipman, Mallorie Rodak
Plot: Takuma is an office worker who is taken care of and coddled by his senior team member Shiori, who is a gorgeous, profoundly kind, loving, and diminutive woman. Takuma certainly hopes that she's not doing it out of duty - but her j...
